Description: The system shall automatically detect and identify the color of each LED (manufacturer Dicuno, red, green, blue, and yellow) connected to the avionics modules.
The system shall classify the health (fully operational, degraded, worn, defective, unknown peripheral) for each connected LED during every bootup.
The system shall generate a maintenance report for any LED classified as worn, defective, or other.
The system shall operate within a temperature range of 10°C to 60°C.
The system shall operate in a humidity range of 20% to 100%.
The system shall operate at a pressure range of 70 kPa to 105 kPa.
The system shall predict the health of each LED with less than 5% false positives and less than 1% false negatives.
The system shall work with a cable length range of 0.1 meter to 5 meters.
The system shall prioritize the functionality of emergency lighting due to its safety-critical nature.
The system shall not have passive failures of the emergency lighting due to common mode error.
The system shall not have out-of-control failures.
The system shall execute on a state-of-the-art IMA platform.
